summary: essment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3855 for the improvement of North 72nd Street, from Greenwood Avenue to West Green Lake Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47194 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
